text: Matilda is a fictional movie directed by Danny DeVito, based on the classic novel Matilda by Roald Dahl. It was first released July 28, 1996 by TriStar Pictures. Starring Mara Wilson, Danny DeVito, Rhea Perlman, Embeth Davidtz, and Pam Ferris, it features the 7-year-old Matilda, a brilliant girl with extraordinary powers that uses them to fight back against her abusive parents, rebel and overthrow the tyrannical headmistress of her school, and save her kindhearted teacher from poverty. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1996 fantasy movies Category:1990s family movies Category:1990s American fantasy movies Category:American family movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies about child abuse Category:Movies about bullying Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies set in schools Category:Movies based on books Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Danny DeVito
title: Matilda (1996 movie)
